description: '''Ladybaby''' is a Japanese [[kawaii metal]] musical group, which originally consisted of aspiring photographic models [[Rie Kaneko]] and Rei Kuromiya, as well as [[Ladybeard]], the bearded crossdressing persona of Australian male professional wrestler [[Richard Magarey]].  On August 1, 2016, the group rebranded itself after Ladybeard's withdrawal from the group, going by "'''The Idol Formerly Known as Ladybaby'''", until they returned to the original Ladybaby moniker in 2018.
